availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Polly Southgate (Falmouth, Pendleton County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Falmouth, Pendleton County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Caleb Hitch. Enslaved Caleb Hitch in Pendleton County in 1865. Resident in Pendleton County in 1850. Resident in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, First District, Pendleton County, 352A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Falmouth, Pendleton County, 436.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 367A.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates Microfilm (1911-1964)._ Microfilm #7016167 (No. 518). Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
